Package omegaui.io.storage

Class DataStorage

java.lang.Object
omegaui.io.storage.DataStorage
public class DataStorage extends Object
omegaui.io.storage.DataStorage Capable of reading, writing and querying JSON file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DataStorage(String... paths)
    The constructor that accepts only the name of the json file Implicitly adds the .json suffix for single argument call.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataStorage

      public DataStorage(String... paths)
      The constructor that accepts only the name of the json file Implicitly adds the .json suffix for single argument call. Example: new DataStorage("settings"); // Auto Adds the .json suffix. Example: new DataStorage(".config", "settings.json"); // the .json suffix needs to be explicitly included.
      Parameters:
      paths - path array

  • Method Details

    • getStorage

      public static DataStorage getStorage(String... paths)
      Manages instance creation to prevent duplication of same data storages. Auto creates the entire path. example call: DataStorage.getStorage(".config", "settings.json"); DataStorage.getStorage("settings");
      Parameters:
      paths - path array
      Returns:
      DataStorage Object

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Reloads the json data from file.

    • query

      public Object query(String... tree)
      Used for quick traversing on nested json objects. Example: { "values": { "x": "1", "y": "2" }, "theme": "atom light" } example call: query("values", "x") will give value 1
      Parameters:
      tree - - array of paths
      Returns:
      Object
